/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, adding depth and complexity to the image. Cars and bicycles are scattered along the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle of daily life. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
